values.title: Ralph Waldo Emerson
values.desc: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness

values.title: Robert A Heinlein Stranger in a Strange Land
values.desc: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own

values.title: Abraham Lincoln
values.desc: Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be

values.title: Marthe TrolyCurtin Phrynette Married
values.desc: Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time

values.title: Chuck Palahniuk Diary
values.desc: Its so hard to forget pain but its even harder to remember sweetness We have no scar to show for happiness We learn so little from peace

values.title: Ernest Hemingway The Garden of Eden
values.desc: Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know

values.title: Albert Camus
values.desc: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life

values.title: Mahatma Gandhi
values.desc: Happiness is when what you think what you say and what you do are in harmony

values.title: Stephen Chbosky The Perks of Being a Wallflower
values.desc: Theres nothing like deep breaths after laughing that hard Nothing in the world like a sore stomach for the right reasons

values.title: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
values.desc: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad

values.title: Dalai Lama XIV
values.desc: Happiness is not something ready made It comes from your own actions

values.title: John Lennon
values.desc: Count your age by friends not years Count your life by smiles not tears

values.title: JRR Tolkien
values.desc: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold it would be a merrier world

values.title: Tom Bodett
values.desc: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world someone to love something to do and something to hope for

values.title: Roy T Bennett The Light in the Heart
values.desc: Attitude is a choice Happiness is a choice Optimism is a choice Kindness is a choice Giving is a choice Respect is a choice Whatever choice you make makes you Choose wisely

values.title: Audrey Hepburn
values.desc: The most important thing is to enjoy your lifeto be happyits all that matters

values.title: Charles M Schulz
values.desc: Happiness is a warm puppy

values.title: Jonathan Safran Foer
values.desc: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness

values.title: Dale Carnegie How to Win Friends and Influence People
values.desc: It isnt what you have or who you are or where you are or what you are doing that makes you happy or unhappy It is what you think about it

values.title: Roy T Bennett The Light in the Heart
values.desc: Take responsibility of your own happiness never put it in other peoples hands

values.title: Gabriel Garca Mrquez
values.desc: No medicine cures what happiness cannot

values.title: George Burns
values.desc: Happiness is having a large loving caring closeknit family in another city

values.title: Marcel Proust
values.desc: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom

values.title: Roy T Bennett The Light in the Heart
values.desc: If you want to be happy do not dwell in the past do not worry about the future focus on living fully in the present

values.title: Chuck Palahniuk Invisible Monsters
values.desc: The only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Dont waste your time in anger regrets worries and grudges Life is too short to be unhappy

values.title: Bertrand Russell The Conquest of Happiness
values.desc: Of all forms of caution caution in love is perhaps the most fatal to true happiness
